title: This Will Make You Smarter: New Scientific Concepts to Improve Your Thinking
description: Featuring a foreword by David Brooks,  This Will Make You Smarter  presents brilliant—but accessible—ideas to expand every mind. What scientific concept would improve everybody’s cognitive toolkit?  This is the question John Brockman, publisher of Edge.org, posed to the world’s most influential thinkers. Their visionary answers flow from the frontiers of psychology, philosophy, economics, physics, sociology, and more. Surprising and enlightening, these insights will revolutionize the way you think about yourself and the world. Contributors
author: John Brockman
